text: One of my favorite stories I’ve gotten to report in a minute. Jessica is resilient and fierce af
author: jorgeavalencia

text: I would love to see that list myself. You might check with Mexicanos Contra la Corrupción
author: jorgeavalencia

text: Según tengo entendido el congreso establecerá parámetros legales para la Guardia Nacional antes de que entre en función. Tocará ver el cómo la procuración de justicia hará parte de la propuesta
author: jorgeavalencia

text: Lopez Obrador hasn’t said explicitly what he finds problematic individually about the police, army or marines. But certainly cases of abuses by police (or military) have been widely documented. Rationale is military already on patrol will get formal policing training
author: jorgeavalencia

text: Have been looking into what will be Mexico's new federal law enforcement agency, and still don't understand in what way it won't be the military patrolling the country's streets and countryside
author: jorgeavalencia
